adHeader: Is Your Closet A Hot Mess?
adDetails: Did you promise yourself in January that 2014 was the year to get organized? How is your closet looking? Let me help you with the items you want to wear, but can't find, and lets get rid of the stuff you don't ever want to wear again. Lets turn your dreary closet into the closet of your dreams! I'll suggest the best organizing tools for your closet once I can assess what's working and what's not working for your items. Let today be the last day of your messy closet! I charge $100 for a 3-hour session, and $25 for each additional hour after the initial 3 hours if more work is needed. Contact me today to help you organize your closet and wardrobe!
